010package imagingbook.pub.color.image;
011
012/**
013 * This is a utility class with static methods for gamma correction
014 * used by LabColorSpace and LuvColorSpace color spaces.
015 * Implemented with double values for better accuracy.
016 * Should be modified to implement a a subclass of ColorSpace.
017 * TODO: duplicate in lib.color? add JavaDoc!
018 */
019public abstract class sRgbUtil {
020        
021        // specs according to official sRGB standard:
022        static final double s = 12.92;
023        static final double a0 = 0.0031308;
024        static final double b0 = s * a0;        // 0.040449936
025        static final double d = 0.055;
026        static final double gamma = 2.4;
027        
028    public static double gammaFwd(double lc) {  // input: linear RGB component value in [0,1]
029                return (lc <= a0) ?
030                        (lc * s) :
031                        ((1 + d) * Math.pow(lc, 1 / gamma) - d);
032    }
033    
034    public static double gammaInv(double nc) {  // input: nonlinear sRGB component value in [0,1]
035        return (nc <= b0) ?
036                (nc / s) :
037                        Math.pow((nc + d) / (1 + d), gamma);
038    }
039    
040        public static float[] sRgbToRgb(float[] srgb) { // all components in [0,1]
041                float R = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[0]);
042                float G = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[1]);
043                float B = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[2]);
044                return new float[] { R, G, B };
045        }
046
047        public static float[] rgbToSrgb(float[] rgb) { // all components in [0,1]
048                float sR = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[0]);
049                float sG = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[1]);
050                float sB = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[2]);
051                return new float[] { sR, sG, sB };
052        }
053    
054    
055        public static void main(String[] args) {
056                for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
057                        double lc = Math.random();
058                        double nc = gammaFwd(lc);
059                        System.out.format("lc = %.8f,  nc = %.8f, check = %.8f\n", lc, nc, lc-gammaInv(nc));
060                }
061                System.out.println("" + (s * a0));
062
063        }
064    
065}
